GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.31 to before v5.14.18
GSD.description:
comedi: vmk80xx: fix bulk-buffer overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.18 by commit 7b0e356189327287d0eb98ec081bd6dd97068cd3, it was introduced in version v2.6.31 by commit 985cafccbf9b7f862aa1c5ee566801e18b5161fb. For more details please see the references link.
